appearances.title: Rep. Robin Kelly & Others on Articles of Impeachment Against Secy. Noem : CSPAN3 : January 14, 2026 8:03pm-8:35pm EST
appearances.snippet: [speaking spanish] allow me to introduce maxine dexter from oregon's third district. >> thank you for meeting this moment with action and more clarity. i am congresswoman maxine dexter and i'm a mother, a physician, and the representative for oregon's third congressional district. last week, i.c.e. murdered renee nicole good in minneapolis. the next day, federal agents shot two people in east portland in my district. these are not isolated events. this is part of a pattern of abuse by brazen militarized federal agents who act without fear of being held accountable to the law. people are being disappeared. people are being assaulted. people are being murdered. when our children and grandchildren ask what we did, when our neighbors were being targeted, i cannot sleep unless i can say every single thing we could. that is why i am helping introduce articles of impeachment remove kristi noem from office. we have all seen her crimes play out before our eyes. she has willfully obstructed racial oversight, denying members of congress to facilities they have a legal right to conduct oversight

appearances.title: American Pulse : CNNW : January 13, 2026 1:00am-2:01am PST
appearances.snippet: . >> among those in attendance, city councilor candace avalos, congresswoman maxine dexter, and stateenator con pham. >> i am tired of watching people get hurt while those in power evade accountability. >> it's important. as an east portland councilor, after everything we've been through in the last 48 hours, to be present, to offer my words, but also to offer opportunities for action. >> local representatives now calling for an independent investigation into thursday's shooting in east portland. the oregon department of justice has announced it will look into the shooting, despite the fbi leading the investigation. >> i think everybody deserves due process. before we jump to allegations that are often rooted in in racist misconceptions. >> audience members and event organizers echoing the demand for impartial answers. >> we want a local investigation here into what happened in the shootings. we stand with communities across the united states who are facing similar threats. >> rounding out the evening, the passing of a flame, a signal of unity. >> jeff gardere peace and guide. our hea
